lines.text: I said take off your clothes
What? How dare you? I don't even know your name.
The names Mike Lippincranz. Now off come the clothes.
Well this is the 26th theatre we have been thrown out of this month. What does that leave us?
This I like, and I get paid for it too
If you're going to bump yourself off in an hour, what's the idea of eating pie?
So I can di-gest right. Nyuk nyuk nyuk!

[dressed up like ballerinas, sing-song]
We're dressed like ballerinas, of course you know we're not, and what you're about to see now folks, is something we ain't got.
